contentrichtext.text: '''Montpelier''' or '''Montpellier''' may refer to: ==Canada== * [[Montpellier, Quebec]] * [[Montpellier (AMT)]], a train station in Montreal, Canada ==France== * [[Montpellier]], a city in southern France ** The [[University of Montpellier]] ==Ireland== * [[Montpelier, County Limerick|Montpelier]], a village in northeast [[County Limerick]], across the River Shannon from O'Briensbridge * [[Montpelier Hill|Montpelier]], a hill in the [[Dublin Mountains]], County Dublin, location of the Irish Hellfire Club * Montpelier, a suburb in [[County Dublin]] ==Jamaica== * [[Montpelier railway station, Jamaica]], a place on the List of National Heritage Sites in Jamaica ==United Kingdom== * [[Montpelier, Brighton]], an early 19th-century suburb of [[Brighton]], England ** [[Montpelier Crescent]], a 38-house crescent of [[Listed building|listed]] residential buildings in the suburb ** Montpelier Junction, where the Lewes line diverges from the Main Line outside [[Brighton railway station]] * [[Montpelier, Bristol]], an inner city neighbourhood in Bristol, England ** [[Montpelier railway station]],in Bristol on the Severn Beach Line * [[Montpellier, Gloucestershire]], a district of Cheltenham, England * the Montpellier Quarter in [[Harrogate]], England ==United States== *[[Montpelier, Idaho]] *[[Montpelier, Indiana]] *[[Montpelier, Iowa]] *[[Montpelier, Kentucky]] *[[Montpelier, Louisiana]] *[[Montpelier, Maryland]] **[[Montpelier Mansion (Laurel, Maryland)]], a U.S. National Historic Landmark *[[Montpelier, Mississippi]] *[[Montpelier, North Dakota]] *[[Montpelier, Ohio]] *[[Montpelier, Vermont]], capital of the U.S. state of Vermont *[[Montpelier, Hanover County, Virginia]] *[[Montpelier, Charles City County, Virginia]] *[[Montpelier (Orange, Virginia)]], another U.S. National Historic Landmark, which is the Virginia estate of James Madison, fourth President of the United States * [[Montpelier (Cabin Point, Virginia)]], [[List of RHPs in VA|listed on the NRHP in Virginia]] * [[Montpelier (Sperryville, Virginia)]], [[List of RHPs in VA|listed on the NRHP in Virginia]] ==Ships== *[[USS Montpelier (CL-57)|USS ''Montpelier'' (CL-57)]], a Cleveland class cruiser which served in the Pacific during World War II *[[USS Montpelier (SSN-765)|USS ''Montpelier'' (SSN-765)]], a Los Angeles class submarine currently in service ==Sports clubs== *[[Montpellier HSC]], Montpellier Hérault Sport Club, a French football club, based in Montpellier, France *[[Montpellier Hérault RC]], Montpellier Hérault Rugby Club, a professional French rugby union, based in Montpellier the capital of [[Languedoc-Roussillon]] ==See also== * [[Montpelier Historic District (disambiguation)]] * [[Monspeliensis (disambiguation)]] * [[Monspessulanus (disambiguation)]] {{disambig|geo}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Montpelier}} [[Category:French toponyms]]
